lead_paragraph: Belgium's  improving potency in front of goal at the European Championship will fill them full of confidence ahead of their quarter-final clash against Wales in Lille later on Friday, injured defender Vincent Kompany has said.

headline.print_headline: Kompany Confident of Belgium's Chances Against Wales
headline.main: Kompany Confident of Belgium's Chances Against Wales
